titleStmt.title: A most pleasant ballad of patient Grissell To the tune of the brides good morrovv.
titleStmt.author: Deloney, Thomas, 1543?-1600.
Boccaccio, Giovanni, 1313-1375.

notesStmt.note: Based on book 10, novel 10 of: Boccaccio, Giovanni. Decamerone.
Verse - "A noble marques as he did ride on hunting hard by a forrest side:".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
